author: Ok-Engineering143
comment: -Ah shi here we go again , -Don't worry its normal. -In fact , it may be unavailable to students till sch begins or even several weeks into the semester (situational) -The system is pretty weird; don't overthink it. -When the time comes, it'll be made available to you -Stay Cool & Patient

author: Gamer_dude12341
comment: Hi, I'm also an enrolling student. The enrollment guide said wait for about a week after completing enrollment. It worked fine for me.
